This page is a list of the 12 presidents of the Republic of Turkey, ranked according to their terms of office.

Some Exceptions
Directly Elected Presidents
* Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, the 12th and incumbent President, is the first and only president to be directly elected by popular vote.
Presidents Who Died in Office
* Mustafa Kemal Atatürk
* Turgut Özal
File:Ataturk1930s.jpg|Mustafa Kemal Atatürk
File:Turgut Özal 1986.jpg|Turgut Özal
Presidents Who Were Members of a Political Party
* Mustafa Kemal Atatürk, 1st President Atatürk was the founder, member, and chairman of Turkey's first political party, the Republican People's Party (CHP).
* İsmet İnönü, 2nd President During his tenure, İnönü was a member and chairman of the Republican People's Party (CHP).
* Celal Bayar, 3rd President During his tenure, Bayar was a member of the Democrat Party, the first party to come to power in Turkey after the CHP.
* Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, 12th and current President Following the 2017 referendum, Erdoğan rejoined the Justice and Development Party (AK Parti), which he had founded. He still serves as the chairman of the AK Parti.
